name: Wipe them out!
description:
The forces of darkness are free again. You and Drako are the only hope.

An army full of monsters has invaded your territory. 
Are you going to let them? No way!

Join forces with Drako fighting and hitting everything in your path!
Your goal is to travel around the four stages to destroy this evil army and its four terrifying commanders.
Let them know who is the boss here, using weapons and abilities to smash them all!
What are you waiting for? Wipe them out! Be legendary! PLAY NOW!

How to Play:
- Three difficulty levels: easy, medium, hard
- Simply drag your finger on the screen to move the character
- Tap the screen to shoot like an insane
- Use the special power-ups wisely

Game Features:
- Compare your score with others with Google Play Services
- Advertising appears in this game.
- A network connection is NOT required to play.
- Intense monster-blasting action game suitable for subway time!

Enjoy!
